data.name: Miguel Angel Martelo Quiroz
data.Profile: I'm a passionated for web development, I enjoy working with technologies in the frontend where I can highlight technologies like Html, Css and Javascript which are my strong skills. All the time, I am looking for opportunities to learn and grow up as a professional. Also, I have the capacity of adapting to the change and work with multi functional teams. I consider myself as a responsible person.

Academic.description: I’m so hungry i’m so hungry but ew not for that pelt around the house and up and down stairs chasing phantoms
Meow in empty rooms. Find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day check cat door for ambush 10 times before coming in for hack.

experience.jobDescription: Frontend developer working with ReactJs, HTML, and CSS, implementing best practices in the company's projects. I use git for version controls.
Webmaster academic platform, virtual courses (moodle), Back-end developer (php), Front-end developer (ReactJS), Servers administration, Databases administration (mysql)
Developer with javascript, c#, and SQLServer
